parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Teams

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array with all [[taskCompleted | uncompleted]] tasks for the given agent. [[getVariable]] could be used on [[Task]] to get the following special local variables from the task:

* <tt>"_this"</tt> [[Team Member]] - the [[teamMember]] [[agent]] the task is assigned to
* <tt>"_taskType"</tt> [[String]] - the name of the task (see [[registeredTasks]])
* <tt>"_thisCreated"</tt> [[Number]] - 1 or 0
* <tt>"_thisRunning"</tt> [[Number]] - 1 or 0
* <tt>"_totalCreated"</tt> [[Number]] - total number of tasks
* <tt>"_totalRunning"</tt> [[Number]] - total number of running tasks
* <tt>"_task"</tt>[[Task]] - often null

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''currentTasks''' teamMember

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> teamMember: [[Team Member]] - [[teamMember]] [[agent]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - array of [[Task]]s

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[currentTasks]] [[teamMember]] _agent</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[taskCompleted]], [[registerTask]], [[registeredTasks]], [[unregisterTask]], [[sendTask]], [[createTask]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
